thread.title: An excellent hotel!!
thread.title_full: An excellent hotel!! - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: patsy1888
title: An excellent hotel!!
text: We arrived on the 15th for a 10 night stay. It lived up to our expectation. We had a bit of a hiccup upon arrival, due to fault of my own. Emilio on reception at the time was very accommodating and extremely helpful, in fact the same can be said about all of the staff that we came across. Location was unbelievable for our first visit to New York. An ideal hub for anybody considering visiting New York. Very modern rooms with all that a person requires. Thank you for the great stay!!
